text:
[REMOTE] Frontend Engineer (React + Redux) | Colony.io

--

Company: https://colony.io early stage, seed-funded startup

Team: 8 full-time remote; 3 backend, 1 frontend, 1 designer; 2 PhDs & 2 Brits; see AngelList for more

Product: broadly future of work; building a blockchain-based collaboration platform to make work more open.

Interview Process: - apply via AngelList (https://angel.co/colony/jobs) - screening interview with co-founder (me, Collin) - submit code samples, preferably react - code challenge - additional conversations w/ team you'd work with - make decision / make offer

Apply: https://angel.co/colony/jobs/171420-frontend-developer
